t: I*pn will sing of lovingkindness and justice, To*ln You, O Lord,*s I will sing praises.
I*ln will give heed to the blameless way. When*ln will You come to me? I*ln will walk within my house in the integrity of my heart.
I*ln will set no worthless thing before my eyes; I*ln hate the work of those who fall away; It*ln shall not fasten its grip on me.
A*ln perverse heart shall depart from me; I*ln will know no evil.
Whoever*ln secretly slanders his neighbor, him I will destroy; No*ln one who has a haughty look and an arrogant heart will I endure.
My*ln eyes shall be upon the faithful of the land, that they may dwell with me; He*ln who walks in a blameless way is the one who will minister to me.
He*ln who practices deceit shall not dwell within my house; He*ln who speaks falsehood shall not maintain his position before me.
Every*ln morning I will destroy all the wicked of the land, So*ln as to cut off from the city of the Lord*s all those who do iniquity.
